description: This file defines the enyo framework's loader and path resolver classes, including methods for managing script, stylesheet, and package dependencies, as well as path rewriting and package aliasing.

classes.name: enyo.pathResolverFactory
classes.description: Class for managing path mappings and macro replacements in paths.

classes.name: enyo.loaderFactory
classes.description: Class for loading and managing dependencies, packages, scripts, stylesheets, and design metadata.

methods.name: addPath
methods.description: Adds a path mapping for a given name.

methods.name: addPaths
methods.description: Adds multiple path mappings from an object.

methods.name: includeTrailingSlash
methods.description: Ensures a path ends with a slash.

methods.name: rewrite
methods.description: Replaces macros in a path with their mapped values.

methods.name: loadScript
methods.description: Loads a script via the machine object.

methods.name: loadSheet
methods.description: Loads a stylesheet via the machine object.

methods.name: loadPackage
methods.description: Loads a package script via the machine object.

methods.name: report
methods.description: Placeholder for reporting/logging.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Begins processing dependencies.

methods.name: more
methods.description: Processes a dependency block, handling asynchronous loading.

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Completes the loading process, handling stack and callbacks.

methods.name: continueBlock
methods.description: Continues processing dependencies in a block, handling asynchronous requirements.

methods.name: require
methods.description: Processes a dependency path, determining if it's a script, stylesheet, design, or package.

methods.name: getPathPrefix
methods.description: Determines the prefix for a path based on its initial character.

methods.name: requireStylesheet
methods.description: Handles stylesheet dependencies.

methods.name: requireScript
methods.description: Handles script dependencies, adding to modules and loading scripts.

methods.name: requireDesign
methods.description: Handles design metadata dependencies.

methods.name: decodePackagePath
methods.description: Decodes a package path into alias, target, folder, and manifest.

methods.name: aliasPackage
methods.description: Creates an alias for a package based on its path.

methods.name: requirePackage
methods.description: Handles package dependencies, including aliasing and loading.
